{
    "pattern": "CREATE TABLE t1(a INT <constraint_type_parameter>); CREATE TABLE t2(a INT <constraint_type_parameter>, b INT, c INT, <constraint_enforce_replace>)",
    "applied_rules": [
        "<constraint_type_parameter>",
        "<constraint_enforce_replace>"
    ],
    "Affected Elements": "FOREIGN KEY, CONSTRAINT",
    "Root Cause Analysis": "The foreign key naming convention generated by TiDB ('fk_1') does not align with MySQL's expected naming convention ('t2_ibfk_1'), which may cause compatibility issues."
}
